name: You're Out Of Control?!
description:
A submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Karen has gone to the supermarket to pick up some games for her beloved son - but they're out of Control! What ever will she do?

Help Karen rampage through the store, causing as much damage as possible. Hopefully the manager will see you are really upset and somehow find you a copy..

Arrow keys or A/D to turn, esc to pause.

Note: We are aware that there is no player character showing when you play (problem with the upload). Unfortunately, there is no way to change this as updates are disabled until the game jam is over. However,  it is still playable, you'll just have to imagine there's a karen in the middle of the screen :)
